categories: Category:Outer Rim Territories planets on the Hydian Way

nodes.text: Ruuria, on the Hydian Way, was the homeworld of the insectoid Ruurians. The planet was located near the Corporate Sector. It featured tropical jungles, manufacturing centers, and universities. Ruuria was a member of the Unified Ruurian Colonies.
The Ruurians' society was made up of 143 colonies, and every Ruurian belonged to a single colony for life.

During the Jedi Civil War, Ruuria aligned with the Sith Empire. Nearly 300 years later, in 3681 BBY, the Sith Empire established a puppet government on Ruuria which then helped scatter the Republic Navy forces in the Tingel Arm campaign.
During the Clone Wars, Ruuria remained a loyalist world.
It briefly surrendered to the Imperial Remnant when Thrawn seemingly returned from the dead in 19 ABY.
During the Yuuzhan Vong War, Ruuria was conquered by the Yuuzhan Vong though they left the natives alone after learning about their life stages and habits.[source?]
